mapper.select: select organization.orgid,organization.img,orginfos.message,organization.name as org_name,foundtime,college.name as col_name,leadername,leadercontact from organization LEFT JOIN orginfos on organization.id=orginfos.orgid LEFT JOIN college on orginfos.collegeid=college.id where organization.orgid=#{org_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id from organization where orgid=#{org_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select students.studentid as stu_id, students.name as stu_name, studentsinfos.grade as grade, college.`name` as college, major.`name` as major, org_student.jointime as jointime from students LEFT JOIN studentsinfos on students.id=studentsinfos.studentid LEFT JOIN college on studentsinfos.collegeid=college.id LEFT JOIN major on studentsinfos.majorid=major.id LEFT JOIN org_student on students.id=org_student.stu_id where org_student.org_id=( select id from organization where orgid=#{org_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) order by org_student.id limit #{firstnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into org_student ( org_student.org_id, org_student.stu_id, org_student.jointime ) VALUE ( #{org_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stu_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{jointime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.select: select * from org_student where stu_id=#{stu_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and org_id=#{org_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select activity.id, activity.`name`, activity.posttime, act_examine.extime, activity.visible, act_examine.result from activity LEFT JOIN act_examine on act_examine.act_id=activity.id where activity.org_id=#{org_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by activity.posttime limit #{snum,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT organization.`name`, message.time, message.id, message.text, msg_stu_org.isread from message LEFT JOIN organization on message.sender_id=organization.id LEFT JOIN msg_stu_org on message.id=msg_stu_org.msg_id where msg_stu_org.org_id=#{org_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by msg_stu_org.isread

SELECT activity.id, activity.`name`, activity.img, activity.starttime, activity.endtime, activity.type, activity.isteam, activity.visible, actinfos.message, actinfos.max, actinfos.tmax, actinfos.tmin FROM activity LEFT JOIN actinfos on activity.id=actinfos.act_id where activity.id=#{act_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT * from act_score where act_score.act_id=#{act_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT students.studentid, students.`name`, studentsinfos.grade, college.`name`, major.`name`, studentsinfos.phone, act_participant.id as ap_id, act_participant.posttime, act_participant.jointime from act_participant LEFT JOIN students on act_participant.stu_id=students.id LEFT JOIN studentsinfos on students.id=studentsinfos.studentid LEFT JOIN college on studentsinfos.collegeid=college.id LEFT JOIN major on studentsinfos.majorid=major.id where act_participant.act_id=#{act_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by act_participant.posttime limit #{snum,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT activity.isteam from activity WHERE activity.id=#{act_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT students.studentid, students.`name`, studentsinfos.grade, college.`name` as col_name, major.`name` as maj_name, studentsinfos.phone, teammember.posttime, teammember.jointime from teammember LEFT JOIN students on students.id=teammember.stu_id LEFT JOIN studentsinfos on studentsinfos.studentid=students.id LEFT JOIN college on college.id=studentsinfos.collegeid LEFT JOIN major on major.id=studentsinfos.majorid where teammember.team_id=#{ap_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select students.studentid, students.`name`, studentsinfos.grade, college.`name` as col_name, major.`name` as maj_name, studentsinfos.phone, act_participant.jointime, act_participant.id as ap_id, act_participant.checktime from students LEFT JOIN studentsinfos on students.id=studentsinfos.studentid LEFT JOIN college on studentsinfos.collegeid=college.id LEFT JOIN major on studentsinfos.majorid=major.id LEFT JOIN act_participant on act_participant.stu_id=students.id where act_participant.act_id=#{act_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT comments.text from comments where comments.id=#{com_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT * from act_score where act_score.act_id=#{act_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT COUNT(act_participant.score_id) from act_participant where score_id=#{score_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT act_score.max from act_score where act_score.id=#{score_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select COUNT(org_student.stu_id) as sum from org_student where org_student.org_id=#{org_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select COUNT(activity.id) as sum from activity where activity.org_id=#{org_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select COUNT(act_participant.id) as sum from act_participant where act_participant.act_id=#{act_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select COUNT(comments.id) as sum from comments where comments.act_id=#{act_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT id from org_student where org_student.stu_id=#{stu_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and org_student.org_id=#{org_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT organization.password from organization where organization.orgid=#{org_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT id,`name`,studentid from students where id in (select teammember.stu_id from teammember left join act_participant on teammember.team_id=act_participant.id where act_id=#{act_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and act_participant.score_id is not null) or id in (select act_participant.stu_id from act_participant where act_participant.act_id=#{act_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and act_participant.score_id is not null) limit #{now,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT count(id) from students where id in (select teammember.stu_id from teammember left join act_participant on teammember.team_id=act_participant.id where act_id=#{act_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and act_participant.score_id is not null) or id in (select act_participant.stu_id from act_participant where act_participant.act_id=#{act_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and act_participant.score_id is not null)
